@nystudio107 @devmodefm @swyx @Netlify @zachleat @eleven_ty @ChrisFerdinandi @GoHugoIO That's interesting. And perhaps related to a common misunderstanding: Yes #JAMstack stands for JavaScript APIs and Markup, but you absolutely *don't need to use all three*. If your site is regenerated and can be served directly from a CDN, it's a JAMstack site.
